title: moving to a region
body: hey riot can you pls help me for im Euv and my friends are in Eun and i moved my account about a month ago and i really really wanna go back for i miss playing with them so if you can, can you pls help me get back in eun

replies.body: I hear you and we want to get you over to your friend as soon as we can, but [transfers ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update)are still down for repairs.  :(  Hang tight while our devs work out the technical issues so you can hop back to your intended server.
thank you for at least telling me it is i while hang on and wait all i can
